verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Zophar <S%H6691><s%> the Naamathite, <S%H5284><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Should not the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%> be answered? <S%H6030><s%> and should a man <S%H376><s%> full of talk <S%H8193><s%> be justified? <S%H6663><s%>
Should your lies <S%H907><s%> make men <S%H4962><s%> hold <S%H2790><s%> their peace? <S%H2790><s%> and when you mock, <S%H3932><s%> shall no <S%H369><s%> man make you ashamed? <S%H3637><s%>
For you have said, <S%H559><s%> My doctrine <S%H3948><s%> is pure, <S%H2134><s%> and I am clean <S%H1249><s%> in your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>
But oh that God <S%H433><s%> would speak, <S%H1696><s%> and open <S%H6605><s%> his lips <S%H8193><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> you;

And that he would show <S%H5046><s%> you the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> that they are double <S%H3718><s%> to that which is! Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that God <S%H433><s%> exacts <S%H5382><s%> of you less than your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> deserves.
Can you by searching <S%H2714><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> out God? <S%H433><s%> can you find <S%H4672><s%> out the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> to perfection? <S%H8503><s%>
It is as high <S%H1363><s%> as heaven; <S%H8064><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> can you do? <S%H6466><s%> deeper <S%H6013><s%> than hell; <S%H7585><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> can you know? <S%H3045><s%>
The measure <S%H4055><s%> thereof is longer <S%H752><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and broader <S%H7342><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> he cut <S%H2498><s%> off, and shut <S%H5462><s%> up, or gather <S%H6950><s%> together, then who <S%H4310><s%> can hinder <S%H7725><s%> him?
For he knows <S%H3045><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> men: <S%H4962><s%> he sees <S%H7200><s%> wickedness <S%H205><s%> also; will he not then consider <S%H995><s%> it?
For vain <S%H5014><s%> men <S%H376><s%> would be wise, <S%H3823><s%> though man <S%H120><s%> be born <S%H3205><s%> like a wild <S%H6501><s%> ass's <S%H6501><s%> colt. <S%H168><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> you prepare <S%H3559><s%> your heart, <S%H3820><s%> and stretch <S%H6566><s%> out your hands <S%H3709><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> him;
If <S%H518><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> be in your hand, <S%H3027><s%> put it far <S%H7350><s%> away, and let not wickedness <S%H5766><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in your tabernacles. <S%H168><s%>
For then <S%H227><s%> shall you lift <S%H5375><s%> up your face <S%H6440><s%> without spot; <S%H3971><s%> yes, you shall be steadfast, <S%H3332><s%> and shall not fear: <S%H3372><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> you shall forget <S%H7911><s%> your misery, <S%H5999><s%> and remember <S%H2142><s%> it as waters <S%H4325><s%> that pass <S%H5674><s%> away:
And your age <S%H2465><s%> shall be clearer <S%H6965><s%> than the noonday: <S%H6672><s%> you shall shine <S%H5774><s%> forth, you shall be as the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

And you shall be secure, <S%H982><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there is hope; <S%H8615><s%> yes, you shall dig <S%H2658><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> you, and you shall take <S%H7901><s%> your rest <S%H7901><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>
Also you shall lie <S%H7257><s%> down, <S%H7257><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> shall make you afraid; <S%H2729><s%> yes, many <S%H7227><s%> shall make suit <S%H2470><s%> to you.

But the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fail, <S%H3615><s%> and they shall not escape, <S%H4498><s%> <S%H6><s%> and their hope <S%H8615><s%> shall be as the giving <S%H4646><s%> up of the ghost. <S%H5315><s%>
